channel.title: [Delta] Smithing?
channel.description:
So I've been looking around mopar and google for quite a while now looking for a tut on how to add smithing to a delta sorce, but cn't find anything. My base i downloaded had it set so when bars were used on an anvil you get coins. I want to find a way to add the correct smithing interface and actually be able to make items.
If anyone knows of a tut or at least can help me get started with this i would be very thankful :)

item.title: [Delta] Smithing?
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/306588-delta-100-smithing-your-server.html
